description: Mukhyamantri Amrutum Yojana provides cashless treatment for critical illnesses for low-income families in Gujarat.
key_features: Coverage up to Rs. 5 lakh per family per year

benefits.coverage_amount: Up to Rs. 5 Lakh per family per year

criteria: Families with annual income below Rs. 4 lakh

steps: Register at empanelled hospital or kiosk

special_notes: Includes tertiary care for critical illnesses
